sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		CustomerKey as string,
		GeographyKey as string,
		CustomerLabel as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		TotalChildren as string,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as string,
		Education as string,
		Occupation as string,
		HouseOwnerFlag as string,
		NumberCarsOwned as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		Phone as string,
		DateFirstPurchase as string,
		CustomerType as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		ETLLoadID as string,
		LoadDate as string,
		UpdateDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script:
source1 derive(CustomerKey = toInteger(CustomerKey),
		GeographyKey = toInteger(GeographyKey),
		NameStyle = toBoolean(NameStyle),
		BirthDate = toDate(BirthDate),
		YearlyIncome = toDecimal(YearlyIncome),
		TotalChildren = toInteger(TotalChildren),
		NumberChildrenAtHome = toInteger(NumberChildrenAtHome),
		DateFirstPurchase = toDate(DateFirstPurchase),
		LoadDate = toDate(LoadDate),
		UpdateDate = toDate(UpdateDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
